name: Boosh Battle Arena
description:
In this game you will play as Baby in the Boosh Battle Arena by fighting, upgrading, and using your magic to survive in the Arena.

You , your magical staff and your trusty roomba zoom and boosh around the arena floor against bats waddle bombs and elves until you cant anymore! Don't worry! As you go you can upgrade your stats so you can fight them easier, we wouldn't want you getting too beat up in all of that fighting against these challenging villians.

Don't forget to have fun!

Features

* Upgrade system 

* Magic 

* Endless Combat
